title: Anyone stuck at log in screen saying Logging on?
body: Anyone have issue with log-in screen stuck on "logging in" status

replies.body: The NA servers experienced some issues last night shortly after 9:00pm PDT that affected the login service. The issue was fixed later in the evening, prior to our scheduled maintenance. If you still have issues, please hit me up.
I'm still having problems, I will enter all the correct credentials and hit log in, then it says logging in for about 2 min then tells me the connection error message.

We're seeing a number of players who are on Century Link having login issues. We're still investigating into this issue, and we've submitted a help ticket with them so we can resolve this with them. We're tracking the issue on [this post](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/B2VFcQKX-stuck-at-logging-in-after-maintenance). If you're a Century Link customer, you may want to use a Virtual Private Network (VPN) to temporarily reroute your connection for now. 

Let me know if you have any other questions.

This is likely because your network is failing to establish a stable connection with the LoL servers. 

[Troubleshoot your connectivity issues.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)
